2017.title: Zenome
2017.description: Zenome is a blockchain-based genomic ecosystem built on the interaction between three different types of information: genomic, personal, and financial data.

2017.title: EDGE
2017.description: Empowering the Development of Genomics Expertise (EDGE) democratize the genomics revolution by helping biologists process Next Generation Sequencing data even if they have little to no bioinformatics expertise.

2017.title: ViPTree
2017.description: The ViPTree server generates a proteomic tree of viral genome sequences based on genome-wide sequence similarities computed by tBLASTx.

2017.title: CircPro
2017.description: CircPro enables users to detect circRNAs, predicting their protein-coding potential and discovering junction reads from Ribo-Seq data.

2017.title: Mammalian Transcriptomic Database
2017.description: MTD browses genes based on their neighboring genomic coordinates or joint KEGG pathway and provides expression information on exons, transcripts, and genes by integrating them into a genome browser.
